title: 15P Land for sale in Kandy
details: 15p land in The Finance City Hills project is for sale. The land is situated in a residential area, a little more than 1km away (5 minutes) from Raja Mawatha (Kandy Badulla main road) and just 12km away (15 minutes) from Kandy town. The land itself contains a scenic view of Knuckles mountain range and consists of all the facilities. Clear deeds and easy access to super markets and ATMs.
